# Pocket DevTools - Full LLM Index

Base URL: https://pocketdevtools.app

## Homepage
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/
- Purpose: Directory for all Pocket DevTools pages.
- Keywords: devtools, pocket devtools, slick developer tools

## Audioscribe
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/audioscribe
- Purpose: Preview markdown and generate spoken audio with local TTS jobs.
- Keywords: markdown tts, audio generation, devtools

## JSON Beautifier
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/json-beautifier
- Purpose: Format, validate, and minify JSON payloads.
- Keywords: json formatter, json validator, devtools

## JSON to TOON
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/json-to-toon
- Purpose: Convert JSON objects into TOON-friendly key/value layout.
- Keywords: json conversion, toon format, devtools

## JSON Compare
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/json-compare
- Purpose: Diff two JSON blobs and inspect mismatches.
- Keywords: json diff, compare json, devtools

## Prompt Improver
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/prompt-improver
- Purpose: Rewrite rough prompts into clearer, structured instructions.
- Keywords: prompt engineering, ai prompts, devtools

## URL Encoder Decoder
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/url-encoder-decoder
- Purpose: Encode and decode URL strings.
- Keywords: url encode, url decode, devtools

## URL Shortener
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/url-shortener
- Purpose: Generate short links and track basic click metrics.
- Keywords: url shortener, short links, devtools

## JWT Decode
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/jwt-decode
- Purpose: Decode JWT headers and payload claims.
- Keywords: jwt decoder, token inspection, devtools

## UUID Generator
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/uuid-generator
- Purpose: Generate single or batch UUIDs.
- Keywords: uuid generator, identifiers, devtools

## Password Generator
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/password-generator
- Purpose: Generate strong passwords with configurable rules.
- Keywords: password generator, security tools, devtools

## Base64 Encoder Decoder
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/base64
- Purpose: Convert text to and from Base64.
- Keywords: base64 encode, base64 decode, devtools

## Regex Tester
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/regex-tester
- Purpose: Test regex patterns with flags and review matches.
- Keywords: regex tester, regular expressions, devtools

## Timestamp Converter
- URL: https://pocketdevtools.app/timestamp-converter
- Purpose: Convert between epoch timestamps and human dates.
- Keywords: unix timestamp, epoch converter, devtools
